name: Library on Heroku
description: One place for your organization's documents.

GOOGLE_APPLICATION_JSON.description: Your Google service account credentials in JSON format. Create one here: https://console.cloud.google.com/iam-admin/serviceaccounts

DRIVE_TYPE.description: Set this value to `folder` if your documents are in a shared folder or `team` for a team drive.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Google OAuth2 Client ID. Create one here: https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/OAuth2

GCP_PROJECT_ID.description: The Google project ID you're using Cloud Datastore with. Not needed if you choose not to use Cloud Datastore.

CUSTOMIZATION_GIT_REPO.description: A git with the contents of your 'custom' directory for automatic deployment.

NPM_TOKEN.description: Enter an NPM token if you are using private modules.
